    • Method Detail

      • find

        public ScreenCreator<?,?,?>[] find()
                            throws ScreenMissingPartsException,
                                   DuplicateScreenException
        Finds Models, Views, and Controllers annotated with @MVC, and returns them as screen creators.
        Returns:
        the array of screen creators
        Throws:
        ScreenMissingPartsException - the screen is missing a Model, View, or Controller
        DuplicateScreenException - there is more than one of the same Model, View Or Controller
